name: Lucky Cat - Giclée Print 8 x 10"
description: Lucky Cat, originally from Japan--Maneki-neko--and popular in Asia. Only, instead of having a paw raised, this cat throwing up that 'W'! The LiHai logo is on the collar & the Chinese characters for LiHai are on the coin in front of this Westcoast cat. Everybody West Up! Our smaller sized prints, 8 by 10 inches. This is a giclée art print with museum quality using archival state-of-the-art Epson printing. Printed on acid-free Somerset Museum Rag with archival pigment-based inks. Each print is signed by the artist, Darel-C.

name: Audio Visual - Giclée Print 8 x 10"
description: Audio and visual appeal. This Mucha-inspired DJ-girl was actually DC’s first piece for LiHai. Conceptualized, sketched, and redrawn several times, this piece is mad LiHai! Our smaller sized prints, 8 by 10 inches. This is a giclée art print with museum quality using archival state-of-the-art Epson printing. Printed on acid-free Somerset Museum Rag with archival pigment-based inks. Each print is signed by the artist, Darel-C.

name: No Evil - Giclée Print 8 x 10"
description: The “see no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil” Chinese monkeys with a LiHai twist and exquisite details. Our smaller sized prints, 8 by 10 inches. This is a giclée art print with museum quality using archival state-of-the-art Epson printing. Printed on acid-free Somerset Museum Rag with archival pigment-based inks. Each print is signed by the artist, Darel-C.

name: Rayce - T-shirt
description: R.A.Y.C.E., a Hip Hop emcee sponsored by LiHai. This is a black t-shirt, 100% Cotton. Check out his music! rayceismmusic.com Rayce is an emcee out of the 805 (Ventura/Oxnard, Southern California). From touring overseas to collaborating with international artists, Rayce has been building a name in the Hip Hop scene by promoting a style all his own. This style? Hip Hop: The Lifestyle Not The Label. Rayce brings his listeners an uncut, raw insight not only into his life but to the observations he has taken throughout his life. At 22 the sky is the limit for this young yet professional lyricist. College educated and self motivated, Rayce can be caught rocking shows locally as well as all over Los Angeles and similar cities throughout California.

name: Lucky Cat - Tanktop (Ash, White Stripes)
description:
Lucky Cat, originally from Japan--Maneki-neko--and popular in Asia. Only, instead of having a paw raised, this cat throwing up that 'W'! The LiHai logo is on the collar & the Chinese characters for LiHai are on the coin in front of this Westcoast cat. Everybody West Up! 100% made and printed in the U.S.A. and sweatshop free, this tank is 100% Fine Jersey ring-spun combed cotton. name: Unique DJ - Shirt (Heather)
description:
Navy blue on heather fabric. This is a tessellation (pattern) of a DJ rockin' a turntable, with the LiHai logo in the middle. All the DJ's are the same, hence the name. Be original! 100% made and printed in the U.S.A. and sweatshop free, this tank is 100% Fine Jersey ring-spun combed cotton. This high-quality tank features a nice loose drape perfect for the summer heat. Please see this size chart before you select a size. name: Crucial Conflict - Giclée Print 18 x 24"
description: A crucial conflict of interest. Angel and demon face off in this symmetrical design. This is a giclée art print with museum quality using archival state-of-the-art Epson printing. Printed on Somerset Museum Rag with archival pigment-based inks. Very limited availability! This is an edition of 5 giclée prints at 18 x 24", and each print is signed and numbered by the artist, Darel-C. NOTE: There is only 1 print left!!

name: LiHai Logo - Shirt
description:
The LiHai logo. Do you see an “L” or an “H”? Neither, or both? This logo symbolizes Darel-C’s vision in his artwork: to exploit perspective and create a near-depth experience for anyone looking. You can’t just glance at DC’s work; to get the most out of it you have to look, ponder, and wonder. For a more detailed description of the name, LiHai, visit our About page. 100% made and printed in the U.S.A. and sweatshop free, this shirt is 100% Fine Jersey ring-spun combed cotton. This high-quality shirt is fashion-fitted, so please select your size accordingly. Please see this size chart. Because this is 100% cotton, there may be minimal shrinkage after washing. This size chart is approximate.
